def mod(a,b,c):
 x = 1
 y = a
 while(b>0):
  if(b%2==1):
   x = (x*y)%c
  y = (y*y)%c
  b /=2
 return x%c
t = int(input())
num = 10**9+7
for i in range(t):
 n,m,q,k = list(map(int,input().split()))
 if m<=q:
  print(0)
 else:
  a1 = m-q
  a2 = mod(q+1,n,num)
  a3 = mod(q-1,n,num)
  a4 = mod(q,n,num)
  a5 = a2-2*a4+a3
  ans = a1*a5
  print(ans%num)
